Html: Did anyone find any significant issues with the new calculations of Arms in .21? With Execute Spam now working I would like some opinions/examples of how it worked for some people.

As I haven't been playing much Arms lately (*sadface*), I haven't been looking at the Arms side of things.  And, given that Fury cannot do ANYTHING for me because it is not accounting for Crit correctly, I'm actually not using Rawr for my Warrior much at all.

I can go take a look now.
Where do you have Execute (spam version) set up prioritization-wise?  I'm seeing quite a few more Executes used in action than I do modeled.
Execute is filler in that phase, any gcd not used by something else (debuffs, buffs, overpower, tfb,sudden death (sorry, it still differentiates, you actual could be sd + exec)
Do you have Exe over Slam?  (And no, I'm having to combine SD+Exe, so it doesn't really make a difference in terms of totals)
for that phase everything is the same except no ms and no slam
